page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH
page.content: I get up at 8:00am.I get washed, dressed and have my breakfast and then my Mum or Dad runs me to the bus stop in the car.I catch the number 6 bus with Tina then get off in town then catch the number 3 bus to school.About 9:00am we walk up to school. Registration is the first activity of the day and then we go to our first lesson.On Mondays these are craft and English.We have break lasting 15 minutes.After break we have a double lesson of science then it is lunchtime My friends and I usually go out onto the field if it is fine and have our lunch.After lunch we have registration Music,Maths and double Spanish.When the bell goes for hometime at 3:45pm I get the No.7 bus to Ash Street and walk the rest of the way home.I then have my tea and do my homework.After that I watch{I.T.V.}and retire to bed.
